description: The first time I see an allied <link=card.luc1><style=AssociatedCard>Lucian</style></link> die, grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Double Strike><sprite name=DoubleStrike><style=Keyword>Double Attack</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: The first time I see an allied Lucian die, grant me +1|+1 and Double Attack.
flavorText: "Our Sentinels are the first line of defense between the tide of restless undead and the realms of man. We hit first, hit hard, and NEVER back down when the lives of our companions are on the line."
name: Senna, Sentinel of Light
